question: Can FTO promote pancreatic cancer development?
ideal_answer: No, the m6A demethylase FTO suppresses pancreatic cancer tumorigenesis.

snippets.text: m6A demethylase FTO suppresses pancreatic cancer tumorigenesis by demethylating PJA2 and inhibiting Wnt signaling.

Moreover, FTO demethylated the m6A modification of praja ring finger ubiquitin ligase 2 (PJA2), thereby reducing its mRNA decay, suppressing Wnt signaling, and ultimately restraining the proliferation, invasion, and metastasis of pancreatic cancer cells.
